com.example.progetto.Spring

Class DataCsvRowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.progetto.Spring.DataCsvRowController

  • @RestController
public class DataCsvRowController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the Spring application and define the filters using GET or POST requests.

      • stats

        @GetMapping(value="/stats/{colName}")
public NumberStats stats(@PathVariable
                                                                java.lang.String colName)
        Gives stats based on the class NumberStats using a GET request.
        Parameters:
        colName - allowed: euBudgetContribution and totalProjectBudget
        Returns:
        average, minimum, maximum, standard deviation and sum

      • retrieveDataColumn

        @GetMapping(value="/data/{colName}")
public java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> retrieveDataColumn(@PathVariable
                                                                                                   java.lang.String colName,
                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="excludeNull",required=false)
                                                                                                   java.lang.String value)
        used to retrieve the data of a single column; both with the null values, or without them It use a GET request, but with the param excludeNull, used to choose if the null values will be displayed or not
        Parameters:
        colName - name of the column picked to show
        value - param used to choose if the null values will be displayed or not
        Returns:
        the data column in a vector format

      • search

        @GetMapping(value="/search")
public java.util.Vector<DataCsvRow> search(@RequestParam(value="value")
                                                                         java.lang.String value,
                                                                         @RequestParam(value="exactMatch",required=false)
                                                                         java.lang.String bool)
        used to search if the value passed in the value is contained in the ata-set, and with the help of the bool it can identify if the value corresponds to the entire line
        Parameters:
        value - string to search in all the data-set
        bool - string to specify if the value corresponds to the entire line
        Returns:
        the vector of the results of the search

      • filter

        @PostMapping(value="/filter")
public java.util.Vector<DataCsvRow> filter(@RequestBody
                                                                          java.lang.String param)
        Generic filter using a POST. If the body of the JSON is a single object it searches for a field, an operator and an input value and returns the filtered dataset. If it is found an attribute called "$or" or "$and" it applies multiple filters, using the following array of objects, based on the attribute. The "$or" filter does a filter for each object and then unites them without considering multiple elements. The "$and" filter just recursively filter the result of the previous decimation.
        Parameters:
        param - JSON with objects composed by a field, an operator and an input value
        Returns:
        the vector of data that satisfy the filter
